Name: Wildheart

Traits.Name: Medium
Traits.Effect: Standard: No penalties. Can use standard gear.

Traits.Name: The Shrub
Traits.Effect: Includes: Leafy Camouflage, Berry Growth, Dense Twigs.

Traits.Name: Tremor
Traits.Effect: Passive: Ground-Sense (Detect footsteps within 30ft. Cannot be Surprised).

Traits.Name: Needles
Traits.Effect: Active: Barrage (Ranged Attack. Fire volley of needles).

Traits.Name: Slither
Traits.Effect: Passive: Creeper (Ignore Difficult Terrain. Climb Speed = Walk Speed).

Traits.Name: Hollow
Traits.Effect: Passive: Lightweight (Float on water. Advantage to Jump).

Traits.Name: Clone
Traits.Effect: Passive: Rebirth (If killed, a clone grows from your corpse in 1 week).

Backstory:
The Threat. Using physical presence, volume, or violence to force compliance. "Get out of my way or I'll go through you."

Leadership interrogation. Lore: Religion theology and cults.

Mastery of banners warhorns and badges to signal and rally troops.

Parry. Technical fighting. Analyzing the duel.

Bulwark. You are the anvil. You absorb the blow.

Mobile Fire. Cardio. Running and gunning without shaking.
